htmlBody:
Very important subject! Thank you all for all of your work and dedication!

I have some questions:

  1. How much news coverage did this report get until now in Argentina? And outside Argentina?

  2. Has any elected politician or ministry representative reacted to this report after it was published?

  3. Is RCG or ALLFED preparing similar reports for other countries?

  4. How many times has the report been downloaded until now?

Hi Francisco,

Thank you for your interest, regarding your questions:

  1. We have made 3 presentations about the report, we are in the process of arranging interviews with the Argentine media once we have some comments from government officials that we are waiting for.
  2. Yes, We are in contact with the general secretary of the SINAGIR (Sistema Nacional para la Gestión Integral del Riesgo) who has shown interest in integrating the subject into their future plans.
  3. It is an idea for the future, preparing reports like this for other countries, ALLFED has previously prepared reports for Australia and the United States.
  4. According to the statistics of our website, it has been downloaded 52 times (together with the Spanish version and the English version).
Hi Jorge, Thank you for the very fast reply! Have a good day! :)
